apita thiyana hama eekama sankalpayak...putuwa,mese,mala,ahasa,ilektrona ,ethakota thopila karana ahawal eka oya serama sankalpa..me sankalpa thawath sankalpa magin therum korala thiyanawa maye puthe...puthe batahira ekala shakthiya kiyala kiyana deta wada therume wenasak thiyanawa ape un shakthiya handunwana eke...batahira un shakthiya kiyanne bhauthika widyawedi witharayi...unta thiyanawa kayika shakthiya..wadiyenma yoda gaththe eka...(ashwa bala) shakthiya kiyana sankalpe hadaganda saththunge minissunge shakthiya unta iwahal una...eeth peradiga ratawal wala shakthiya kiyaddin karmaya shakthiya,aadhyathmika shakthiya wage dewaluth enawani...eeth ithin ape unge thiyana gon molawal oya batahira ekalage shakthin ekka ape karma shakthi ehema patalan hath pole gagena natanawa...ara guruthwakarshane piliganna eka deyiyo piligan na..mokada unta parikshana magin oppu karapu ankanaya korapuwa dila nani...onna ahapallako...
